topic.title: Pelvic And Genitourinary Assessment - conformance rules

section.p: Qualitative assessment of condition of patient's pelvic and genitourinary region

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11512 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.118"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11236)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67531-4" Physical findings of Pelvis+Genitourinary NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10390)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:11237)
NEMSIS Trace: EExam.03

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:10392), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet PelvisGenitourinaryAssessment 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.33 DYNAMIC (CONF:10391)
NEMSIS Trace: EExam.12
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11236)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67531-4" Physical findings of Pelvis+Genitourinary NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10390)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:11237)
NEMSIS Trace: EExam.03

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:10392), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet PelvisGenitourinaryAssessment 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.33 DYNAMIC (CONF:10391)
NEMSIS Trace: EExam.12

body.codeblock: <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.118"/> <code code="67531-4" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" displayName="Physical findings of Pelvis+Genitourinary NEMSIS"/> <effectiveTime/> <value xsi:type="CD"/> </observation>
